name: Dungeons and Hot Dogs
description:
Suggest playing this game on Firefox in browser rather than in Chrome.

THE CASTLE OF YOUR BURGER KING IS UNDER ATTACK BY DOGS, THEY ARE NOT LIKE HOT DOGS, THEY'RE VERY UNCOOL, DEFEAT THEM TO RECEIVE A REWARD!

Be warned: This game has a very Dark Soul-esque difficulty rating and totally doesn't have any abusable AI 'oversights' that can help you defeat the game if it's too complicated.

HINT:
Aim your block at the Sausage that is about to hit you. 
Drink Ketchup to not die, cause otherwise you will.

Also: If you want a challenge, try to complete the game with as little reserve ketchup used. The bigger your stock, the better you are at videogames and the higher your chance is to make it in the pro leagues for Dungeons and Hotdogs.
